Alba solicita un crédito para la compra de 30 gallinas ponedoras, concentrado para alimentarlas y una casa artesanal para albergas las gallinas.
texts.en:
Alba is a 38-year-old woman. She has four children, aged six, five, four, and fourteen. She lives with her husband on a farm, where she raises hens. This work has been a lifeline and a blessing as she has been able to give her children an education.

Her greatest wish is to improve her living conditions—to have a nicer space and more things, such as a television, games for her children, and many other things that a mother dreams of having in her home—, but the most important thing for her is to have the money to buy school supplies and school uniforms for her children.

Alba is requesting a loan so she can buy 30 laying hens, feed, and a hen house for her hens.

loans.use: to buy 30 laying hens, feed, and a hen house

loans.name: Bryan Enrique

texts.es:
Bryan es un  joven de 20 años, es soltero,  es muy querido por su padres porque él es muy responsable en sus actividades, Bryan vive junto a sus padres y hermanos en una comunidad de San Lucas Tolimán. 

Bryan es un joven que tiene bien claro su visión, pues actualmente él trabaja para una serigrafía (técnica de reproducción de imágenes en cualquier material) en la comunidad donde vive, pues con este trabajo el genera su economía, para el trabajo  Bryan le pone mucho empeño porque lo él pretende es llevar todos los conocimientos para seguir aprendiendo para que más después él puede tener su propio negocio. 

Pues para que Bryan pueda seguir superando en la vida, él quiere seguir estudiando en la universidad, pues para poder cubrir los gastos tales como: pago de inscripción,  la cuota mensual, reproducción de material  libros y demás cosas  que se presentan en la época escolar, él solicita un prestamo de tres mil quetzales, para que Bryan pueda pagar el prestamo, tendrá que seguir trabajando muy disciplinadamente para poder también responder en la universidad. 

Las aspiraciones en el futuro de Bryan es graduarse en la universidad, luego construir su propia casa y tener todo lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
Bryan is 20, single, and very loved by his parents, because he is very responsible in his activities. Bryan lives together with his parents and siblings in a community of San Lucas Tolimán.

Bryan is a young man who has a very clear vision, since he currently works as a screen-printer (image reproduction technician in various materials) in the community where he lives, since with this work he generates some income. Bryan puts a lot of determination into his work, because he wants to increase his knowledge in order to continue learning, so that afterwards he can have his own business.

In order to be able to succeed in live, he wants to continue studying at his university, Bryan is asking for a loan of 3 thousand quetzalles, in order to fulfill the costs such as registration fees, semester costs, materials, books, and other costs that come up at school. In order to pay off the loan, as well as succeed in school, he will have to continue to work diligently. 

Bryan's aspirations for the future are to graduate university and to build his own house and do whatever necessary in order to live.

loans.use: to pay school tuition.

loans.name: Ana Iri

texts.es: Ana, tiene 40 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene tres hijos, reside en el municipio del Progreso, Yoro. 	Ana siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, lleva 15 años de dedicarse a la venta de cosméticos los cuales vende de manera ambulante. Vende cremas, lociones, tintes, tratamientos para el cabello, champú, y otros. Ha solicitado varios préstamos en la institución para invertirle al negocio. Esta solicitando otro por 6,000 lempiras para abastecerse de más productos para la venta como ser cremas, champú, lociones, tratamientos, y otros cosméticos que le pidan sus clientes. Tiene como meta establecer mejor  su negocio y ayudar a que se gradúen sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana, 40, lives in a domestic partnership with her spouse, with whom she has three children. She lives in the town of Progreso, Yoro. Ana is always dedicated to her store and has 15 years of selling cosmetics, which she sells by traveling to different areas. She sells creams, lotions, dyes, hair treatments, shampoo, and others. She's asked for several loans from this institution, to invest in her business. She is asking for another, of 6,000 lempiras, to stock up on more products to sell, such as creams, shampoos, lotions, treatments, and other cosmetics that her clients ask for. Her goal is to improve her store and help her children to graduate.

loans.use: to by creams, shampoos, lotions, treatments, and other cosmetics that her clients ask for.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es un hombre muy disciplinado con su familia, él tiene 4 hijos comprendidas entre las edades de 5 a 18 años,  José tiene 38 años, esta bonita familia vive en una comunidad de Chichicastengo. 

José  para la generación de su economía, se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz, en la comunidad donde vive, es un bonito negocio porque hay épocas del año que si se le gana buen porcentaje. Pero José  además de este negocio, él también cuenta con una zapatería estas actividades las ha logrado por ser un hombre perseverante.   
José es un señor que le gusta trabajar la agricultura y es más le ayuda a complementar  el sustento de su familia pues él cultiva maíz, además el cultivo de maíz es una cultura que existe en Guatemala la mayor parte de las familias siembran maíz año tras año. 
 José para este año necesita volver a sembrar,  pero ahora se ve en  la necesidad de buscar un prestamo para invertir en su agricultura, el presupuesto de José ascienda a cinco mil quetzales. José tiene esperanzas de conseguir su prestamo y con eso asegura alimentación para sus hijos ya que es maíz es un alimento básico para las familias. 
El anhelo de José es tener buena cosecha y si fuera así él estaría vendiendo una parte y el ingreso le servirá para apoyar a sus hijos para que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Jose is a very disciplined man with his family. He has 4 children who fall between the ages of 5 and 18 years old. Jose is 38 years old. This beautiful family lives in a community in Chichicastengo. To generate money, Jose works in the buying and selling of corn in the community where he lives. It is a good business because there are periods of the year that earn him a good rate. In addition to this business, Jose also has a shoe store. He has succeeded with these businesses due to being a preservering man.

Jose is a man who likes to farm and planting corn helps him to complement his family’s nourishment. Additionally, the cultivation of corn is a culture that exists in Guatemala. The majority of families plant corn year after year.

For this year, Jose needs to plant again but he is now in need of seeking a loan to invest in his farm. Jose’s budget has risen to five thousand Quetzales. Jose hopes to get a loan and with it, to ensure food for his children since corn is a staple for families.

Jose longs for a good harvest and if it is so, he will be selling one part and the income will serve him to support his children to continue studying.

loans.use: to buy supplies for planting corn.

loans.name: El Rey Group

texts.es: El Rey es un grupo solidario integrado por tres socios laboriosos, es coordinado por el señor Clodoniro que a sus 60 años demuestra que tiene las energías para seguir trabajando y continuar mejorando las condiciones de vida,  es propietario de un taller metalúrgico y cuenta con quince años de experiencias y es el tercer ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de hierro para realizar soldaduras, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado mejorar la calidad ofrecida ya que ha invertido en materiales por lo que el servicio es mejor. Las demás integrantes son las señoras, Marbeli una mujer trabajadora que tiene la edad de 29 años y se dedica a la comercialización de ropa nueva y de segunda en su comunidad, este negocio lo impulsó hace siete años, y Elena una señora emprendedora de 32 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa en su comunidad desde hace tres años.
texts.en:
El Rey is a solidarity group consisting of three hard-working members.  It is coordinated by Senor Clodomiro who at 60 years old shows that he has the energy to continue working and to continue improving the conditions of his life.  He is the proprietor of a metallurgical workshop in which has fifteen years of experience. 

This is the third cycle in which ADIM has provided him financing for his business.  The current loan request is for the purchase of metal for welding.  With the previous loans he has succeeded in improving the quality of what he offers since he has invested in materials which give better service.

The rest of the members are women.  Marbeli is a hard-working woman who is 29 years old.  She works marketing new and second-hand clothing in her community.  She started this business seven years ago.  Elena is an entrepreneurial 32-year-old woman.  She has been selling clothing in her community for three years.

loans.use: to buy metal since it is the material used the most

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio es un hombre muy perseverante, todo por el bienestar de su familia,  él tiene 40 años tiene una bonita familia de 5 hijos, esta familia vive en una comunidad de Santa Catarina Palopo. 

Julio es una persona que por la pobreza de sus padres él no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, sin embargo eso no fue obstáculo para  sobrevivir, él ahora cuenta con un negocio que le ha ayudado a prosperar con su familia, él desde hace 16 años se dedica a la compra venta de mostacilla y diversidad de artesanías, esta actividad lo realiza fuera de su comunidad, buscando zonas más turísticas.  Con esta actividad el genera su economía, para  que su familia tenga lo esencial. 
Pues con la experiencia de tantos años, Julio quiere adquirir otro negocio de artesanías, por tal motivo para lograr este anhelo, él solicita un prestamo de seis mil quetzales, Julio manifiesta que los negocios son factibles, si la persona lo sabe manejar. 
El sueño más grande de Julio es generar ingresos mientras la vida se lo permite y así poder realizar ahorro, porque cuando su edad avance, con sus ahorros puede mantenerse.
texts.en:
Julio is a very persevering man, all for the well-being of his family. He is 40 years old. He has a beautiful family of 5 children, which lives in a community of Santa Catarina Palopo.

Julio is a person who did not have the opportunity to go to school, due to the poverty of his parents. Nevertheless, this was not an obstacle to his survival. He now has a business that has helped him to prosper, along with his family. For 16 years he has bought and sold beaded necklaces and a variety of handicrafts. He does this work outside of his community, seeking more touristed zones. With this business he generates his income, so that his family can have the essentials.

Now, with the experience of so many years, Julio wants to acquire another handicrafts business. Therefore, to achieve this goal, he is applying for a loan of six thousand quetzales. Julio states that the businesses are feasible, if the person knows how to manage it.

Julio's biggest dream is to generate income while life allows him and thus be able to save, because when he is older, he can maintain himself with his savings.

loans.use: to expand his handicraft business

loans.name: Bahodir

texts.ru: Баходир мужчина в возрасте 27 лет, женат и имеет одного ребенка. Баходир живет в сельской местности далеко от города. Как и многие мужчины сельских местностей Баходир по сезону ездит в Россию на заработки. Жена помогает ему вести хозяйство по дому и летом выходит на полевые работы как наемный работник. Постепенно заработав немного денег, Баходир  открыл у себя в селе продуктовый магазин, наладил бизнес и начал обустраивать свой дом. Так как он сам в свое время не смог получить должного образования, своих детей он хочет обучить и дать им достойное образование. Сейчас Баходир делает ремонт в доме и у него нехватка финансов, чтобы закончить ремонт. С данной проблемой он обратился в «АРВАНД» за финансовой поддержкой. На полученные деньги он хочет закончить ремонт. Баходир заранее выражает благодарность за предоставленную финансовую помощь сельским жителям.
texts.en: Bakhodir is a 27-year old man, married, with one child. Bakhdir lives in a rural area, far from town. Like many men in rural area, Bakhodir periodically travels to Russia for seasonal work. His wife helps him to take care of the household and in the summer takes on farm work as a hired laborer. Eventually, after being able to save up some money, Bakhodir opened a grocery store in his village, got his business going and started to do improvements on his house. Since he was not able to complete his education, he would like to make sure that his children have access to good education. At present Bakhodir is doing renovations  in his house, and is running short  on funds needed to complete the work. This is why he has applied to Arvand for financial support. He would like to use his loan to complete the renovations. Bakhodir expresses his gratitude for financial help offered to rural dwellers like himself.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Haitjon

texts.ru: Хайитчон женщина в возрасте 33 лет, замужем и имеет четверых детей. Она живет в сельской местности. Хайитчон с юных лет занимается животноводством.  У нее нету образования поэтому  всю свою жизнь занимается выращиванием скота. Муж у нее  подрабатывает таксистом по вечерам, а днем помогает своей жене, но его деньги хватает только на семейные нужды иногда даже и не хватает, поэтому выращивание скота это их основной доход. Хайитчон ухаживает за скотом, а ее муж занимается купле продажей скота. Они трудятся день и ночь, чтобы дать своим детям образование, чтобы они не нуждались как свои родители. Хайитчон берет кредит, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свое стадо. Она очень благодарна таким организациям как «АРВАНД» за финансовую поддержку сельских жителей.
texts.en: Haitjon is a 33-year old woman, married and the mother of four. She lives in a rural area. She has been raising livestock since her youth. She was not able to get an education and so she has been raising livestock all ofher life. Her husband works as a taxi driver on the side in the evening, and during the day helps Haitjon. His earnings are barely enough to support the household, and thus raising livestock is the family's main source of income. Haitjon takes care of the animals, and her husband handles the buying and selling part. They work very hard to be able to provide for their children's education, so that their children would not  experience financial hardships like them. Haitjon is taking out a loan to buy more cattle and increase her livestock. She is very thankful to organizations such as Arvand for its financial support offered to rural dwellers.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, de la etnia miskita; tiene 58 años de edad, casada con tres hijos: Dos mayores de edad y la menor de 18 años estudia su primer año de administración de empresas en una de las universidades del municipio. Su esposo está desempleado. Desde hace 27 años estableció su pequeña tienda de ropa y calzado en un tramo en el mercado municipal, generando sus ingresos propios con lo cual aporta económicamente en el hogar. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más mercadería en Managua y Masaya, así poder incrementar sus ingresos y vender los productos a precios accesibles  a su clientela de Bilwi. Su sueño es llegar a ser una negociante exitosa, con un negocio grande, próspero y tener una casa bonita.
texts.en:
Graciela is originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is ethnically Miskito. She is 58 years old, married, with three children. Two are grown and the youngest is 18 and in her first year studying business administration at one of the universities in the municipality. Her husband is unemployed. 

For the last 27 years she has had a small clothing and footwear store in a stall at the municipal market generating her own income with which she contributes to the financial support of her household. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise in Managua and Masaya in order to increase her income and sell the products at prices that are affordable to her Bilwi customers. Her dream is to become a successful businesswoman with a large prosperous business and to have a pretty home.

loans.use: to buy dresses, t-shirts, women's and children's underwear, and footwear in Managua.

loans.name: Marina Briggeth

texts.es: MARINA BRIGGETH: Es una mujer cordial, tiene 31 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos: El mayor de 15 años de edad, estudia su segundo año de secundaria y el menor de 12 años, cursa su cuarto grado de primaria. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal como entrenador de boxeo. Con el propósito de apoyar con los gastos del hogar, generar sus propios ingresos, desde hace 3 años estableció una pequeña pulpería en un anexo de madera que construyo pegado a su vivienda de tambo. Está solicitando financiamiento para incrementar su inventario de productos, comprar: granos básicos, detergentes, jabones de lavar ropa, de baño, de lavar trastes, chiverías, pan, papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida. Su sueño es establecer un comedor para ofrecer comida típica.
texts.en:
Marina Briggeth: She is a cordial woman who is 31 years old. She is married and has two children, the oldest is 15 years old and is in the second year of high school; and the youngest is 12 years old and is in the fourth grade of primary school. Her husband works informally as a boxing trainer. 

With the purpose of supporting household expenses, Marina makes her own money. Three years ago she opened a small corners tore in a wooden annex she built attached to her raised home.

She is requesting the loan to increase her inventory of products, to purchase: basic grains, detergents, clothing soap, dishsoap and handsoap, Chiverias brand products, bread, toilet paper and feminine products. In this way she will increase her income and quality of life. Marina's dream is to establish a cafe where she will sell traditional foods.

loans.use: to purchase detergent, bread, basic grains toilet paper and feminine products, among other things.

loans.name: Sadia

texts.es: Sadia: Es una mujer cordial, originaría de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 45 años de edad, casada, tiene cuatro hijos: Tres son mayores de edad e independientes y la menor de 12 años, estudia su quinto grado de primaria. Trabaja como maestra de educación primaria. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal, como pescador. Está solicitando financiamiento para reparar el techo de su vivienda y comprar: clavos, zinc, madera y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una vivienda que tenga mejores condiciones para sus hijos y sobre todo mayor seguridad.
texts.en:
Sadia: She is a friendly woman, originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is 45 years old and married. She has four children: three are older and independent and the youngest, who is 12 years old, studies in the fifth grade of primary school. She works as a primary school teacher. Her husband works informally as a fisherman.

She is asking for financing in order to repair the roof of her house and to buy: nails, metal sheets, wood, and to cover labor costs. She and her husband dream of having a home that has better conditions for her children and above all, better security.

loans.use: To repair the roof of her home and to buy: nails, metal sheets, wood, and to cover labor costs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase his working capital and buy many clothes for resale, to earn more

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase his working capital and buy large quantities of rice, beans, and cassava flour for resale, to earn more

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria Teresa tiene 72 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Maria Teresa espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Teresa is 72 years old, married and lives with her husband in the rural area of Cayaltí, in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region of Peru’s northern coast. Here, the people mainly make a living in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

María herself makes a living raising and selling small animals, such as chickens, ducks, turkey and more. She runs her business out of her home. María has ten years’ experience with the business and has customers who provide her with good personal and professional references. This loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of animals, such as hens, ducks, turkey, chickens and more, and to buy feed for these animals. With this loan, María hopes to offer her customers a better product. This will allow here to increase her income and, as a result, improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals, such as hens, ducks, turkey, chickens and more, and to buy feed for these animals.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, reside en el distrito de Buenos Aires que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

El se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción como madera y leña así como al transporte y carga de los mismos, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes que brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de materiales como madera y leña para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Luis espera ofrecer una mayor cantidad de productos a sus clientes lo que aumentará su nivel de ventas y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is 56 years old and has a partner. He lives in the Buenos Aires district of the Morropón province in the Piura region of Peru’s northern coast. Here, life is quiet; the people make a living mainly in trade and raising small animals.

Luis himself makes a living selling building materials such as wood and firewood, as well transporting these products. He has ten years’ experience with the business and has clients who provide him with good personal and professional references. This loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of materials, such as wood and firewood, to increase stock at his business. With this loan, Luis hopes to offer his customers a greater quantity of products, thus increasing his sales and, consequently, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of materials, such as wood and firewood, to increase stock at his business.

loans.name: Elma

texts.es:
Elma tiene 27 años de edad, vive con su menor hija en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Zaña que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno así como a la venta de leche que este produce, cuenta con más de 01 año de experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado así como para realizar reparaciones del lugar donde los cría (corrales), con esto Elma espera mejorar su nivel de ingresos lo que le va a permitir aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elma is 27 years old and lives with her young daughter in the family home in a rural area of Zaña. Zaña is in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region of Peru’s northern coast. Here, life is quiet; the people make a living mainly in trade and raising small animals.

Elma makes a living raising cattle, as well as selling the milk from her animals. She has over a year’s experience with this business and has customers who provide her with good personal and professional references. This loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of cattle and to pay for repairs to corrals. With this loan, Elma hopes to increase her income and, as a result, improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of cattle and to pay for repairs to corrals.

loans.name: Ascencion

texts.es:
Ascencion tiene 64 años, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge en el distrio de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y ganadería.

La actividad a la que se dedica Ascencion es a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto y logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Ascencion is 64 years old and lives in a privately-owned house built with rustic materials with his partner. The couple lives in the Pomahuaca district of the Jaén province in the Cajamarca region of Peru’s northern highlands. Here, life is quiet; the people make a living mainly in trade and cattle-raising.

Ascencion works in farming: he grows rice, and now has ten years’ experience in the trade. He will use this loan for his farming work, buying anti-disease treatments and fertilisers and paying for labourers to help with the harvest. This will help the crops and production, giving Ascencion a good harvest – he will have a greater yield and a better quality of product. As a result, he will have fewer problems selling his product and will be able to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers and anti-disease products,and to pay labourers to help with farming work.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Это Фотима. Ей 49 лет. Фотима жительница района Кубадиён. Она замужем и имеет детей. Ее муж и сыновья работает строителем. Фотима работает учительницей в школе, и свободное время она занимается растениеводством. У нее есть земельный участок, где она занимается растениеводством. Фотима уже более 2 лет занимается этой деятельностью. Ей в работе помогает муж и сыновья. Фотима очень хорошо знает свою работу. Она сажает лук и морковь. Сейчас она планирует посадить картофель. Для посева нового урожая ей нужно купить семян картофеля, по этой причине  Фотима берет кредит, чтобы начать новый посев. Это кредит поможет не лишиться урожая на следующий сезон. Фатима заранее благодарна.
texts.en:
This is Fotima.  She is 49 years old and lives in the Qubadiyon region with her husband and children.  Fotima's husband and sons work in construction.   Fotima is a school teacher and she grows food crops in her free time.  She has a plot of land where she grows onions and carrots.  She has been doing this for over two years and she is very good at it.  Her husband and sons help her with her work.

Currently, Fotima is planning on planting potatoes and she needs to buy seeds.  For this reason, she is taking out a loan.  The loan will help her not to wind up without a crop at harvest time.  Fatima is thankful in advance.

loans.use: to buy potato seed

loans.name: Othoniel

texts.es:
Othoniel tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive con su familia en el Distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural en la que su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, desde hace varios años contando con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pollos, entre otros, así como alimento balanceado para estos, lo que le permitirá incrementar el stock de su negocio y tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ventas y por ende le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Othoniel is 47 years old and is married. He lives with his family in the district of Oyotún, a rural area where the people earn a living in farming, business and stockbreeding. It is located in the Province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the North coast of Peru.

For several years he has been earning a living breeding and selling animals such as ducks, roosters, hens and chickens. He has experience in the business and has very good personal and professional references in the area. He carries out his business in the back part of his house. He has asked for this loan to buy a larger number of animals such as hens, ducks, chickens, among others, and to give them balanced food. This will allow him to increase the stock of his business and will have a positive impact on his level of sales and finally will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more animals such as hens, ducks, chickens, among others, as well as balanced food for them.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор молодая жительница района Кубодиён. Она замужем и еще не имеет детей. Ей всего 25 лет. Гулбахор живет вместе мужем и свёкром. Её муж занимается разнорабочим на районе. Гулбахор занимается растениеводством. Она сажает пшеницу, картофель, морковь и лук. Она уже 2 лет своей жизни продвигает данную деятельность. Гулбахор хочет собрать богатый урожай и получить больше доход. Она обратилась за кредитом для купли качественных семян картофеля и пшеницы. После получение кредита Гулбахор займется посевом урожая. Это кредит поможет ей получить хороший урожай.
texts.en:
Gulbahor is a young woman who lives in the Qubadiyon region with her husband and father-in-law.  She is only 25 and has no children.  Gulbahor's husband works at odd jobs in their area.  Gulbahor grows food crops.  She raises wheat, potatoes, carrots, and onions.  She has carried on this business for over two years.  

Gulbahor wants to have a big harvest and earn a large profit.  She has applied for a loan in order to buy high quality potato and wheat seed.  She will start planting once she gets the loan.  The loan will help Gulbahor have a good harvest.

loans.use: to buy potato and wheat seed

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy beans

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy millet

loans.name: Kalamniso

texts.ru: На фотографии запечатлена Каламнисо. Ей 43 лет. Каламнисо проживает вместе семьей в городе Куляб. Она замужем и мать троих сыновей. Ее муж занимается строительным мастером. Старшие сыновья учатся в университете, а младший сын ходит в школу. Каламнисо шустрая и ответственная женщина. Она в городе Кулябе занимается торговлей женской одежды. Каламнисо любит свою работу и планирует остаться в этом бизнесе. Ей нравится встречаться с новыми людьми и помогать им с выбором. Каламнисо планирует расширить деятельность. Из-за нехватки денежных средств она обратилась за кредитом. Каламнисо за счет кредита перевезет зимнюю одежду на продажу, и привлечет больше клиентов. Она верить, что Вы ей поможете, и доход от продажи не упадет.
texts.en:
Pictured here is Kalamniso.  She is 43 years old and she and her family live in Kulob.  Kalamniso is married and the mother of three sons.  Her husband is a construction foreman.  Her eldest two sons study at the university and her youngest is still in school.  Kalamniso is a sharp and responsible woman.  She sells women's clothing in Kulob.  She loves her work and plans to stay in this business.  She likes meeting new people and helping them choose their clothes.  

Kalamniso is planning to expand her business.  Because she lacks the necessary funds Kalamniso has applied for a loan, which she will use to buy winter clothing.  This will attract more customers.  She believes you will help her and that she won't lose out on the profit.

loans.use: to buy women's winter clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Rogelio tiene 28 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge en el distrito de Buenos Aires que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde hace más de 2 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Rogelio espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 28 years old and lives with his life partner in the Buenos Aires district of the Morropon province in the Puira region in northern coastal Peru. 

Life in the community is quiet and its inhabitants mainly make a living working in commerce and livestock breeding. 

For more than 2 years, he has been making a living offering rides to passengers in his vehicle (motor taxi). He is experienced at his job and has very good personal and work references. 

He will use the loan to carry out reparations and maintenance on his vehicle which is in a bad condition at the moment. By doing this, Rogelio hopes to offer a better service to his clients which will help him make a better profit and, in turn, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to carry out reparations and maintenance on his vehicle which is in a bad condition at the moment.

loans.name: Ayibjon

texts.ru: Аюбжону 22 года. Аюбжон вырос в сельском местности в джамоате Октеппа. С детства он увлекался куплей продажей. Аюбжон часто выходил в месте со своим отцом на скотный рынок. Отец перепродавал скот. Так как они жили в селе их семья ещё занималась  выращиванием риса. С детства отец приучил его к труду. Отец часто напоминал ему пословицы про труд «К чему душа лежит, к тому и руки приложится» или же «Какие труды, такие и плоды». Любовь к труду пробужденная с детства воспитала его трудолюбивым и усердным. В данное время Аюбжон самостоятельный мужчина. Женат, у них дочка. Живет отдельно от родителей. Жена дома занимается вышиванием национальных платьев. Сам Аюбжон имеет точку в районном вещевом рынке. Где продает мужскую одежду. Аюбжон  хочет,  получит кредит чтобы расширит свой бизнес. Благодаря  которому он ещё лучше улучшит свое семейное обстоятельство.
texts.en:
Ayibjon is 22 years old.  He grew up in a rural part of the Oqteppa district.  Since childhood, Ayibjon has been interested in buying and selling.  His father often took him to the market where he bought and sold cattle.  Since they lived in the countryside, their family also grew rice.  Ayibjon's father taught him to work early on and often repeated the sayings "What your heart loves, your hands should do" and "The more you put in, the more you get back out."  This early love for work has made Ayibjon a hard working, earnest, and independent man.  He is married and has a young daughter.  They live in their own home, where his wife works sewing traditional women's clothing.

Ayibjon has a stall at the market where he sells men's clothing.  He would like to take out a loan in order to expand his business.  As a result, he will be able to further improve life for his family.

loans.use: to buy goods for selling

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Mukarram

texts.ru: Мукаррам 51 год. Она замужем. Имеет троих детей. У нее высшее образование.Работает бухгалтером много лет.  Со своим супругом  они дали хорошее образование детям и теперь помогают им растить внуков.  Мукаррам хочет, чтобы ее внуки также получили хорошее образование. Для  достижения  этой цели Мукаррам с мужем работают не покладая рук.  Дополнительно  это дружная семья  обрабатывают арендованную землю и выращивают на ней зерно. Для подготовки сезона посева Мукаррам хочет закупить семена и минеральные удобрения.  Для этой цели она хочет взять кредит с «Арванд», так как у нее хорошая кредитная история  и она довольна обслуживанием  «Арванд» она снова обратилась к нам. Мукаррам надеется подготовившись к сезону она сможет получить хороший урожай и повысить благосостояние своей большой семьи.
texts.en:
Mukkaram is 51 years old, married and has three children.  She has a higher education, and has been an accountant for many years.  She and her husband provided their children with good educations and now help them raise their grandchildren.  Mukkaram wants her grandchildren to get good educations too.  She and her husband work without rest to reach this goal.  For additional income, this close family rents a piece of land where they raise grain crops.

In order to get ready for planting, Mukarram wants to buy seed and mineral fertilizers.  Since she has a good credit history and is satisfied with the service she has received from MDO Arvand, LLC, she would like to take out another loan.  Mukarram hopes that with good preparation for planting, she will reap a good harvest and improve the wellbeing of her big family.

loans.use: to buy seed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric and materials to increase her turnover

loans.name: Karina Yessenia

texts.es:
Karina tiene 24 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hija en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como chivos, pollos, gallinas, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 06 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como chivos, gallinas, patos, entre otros, así como para realizar reparaciones del lugar donde los cría (corrales). Con esto Karina espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Karina, 24, is a single mother. She lives with her daughter in a rural area of the district of Pucará, which is located in the province of Jaén and the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The inhabitants of this district mainly work in agriculture, livestock, and trade.

She raises and sells small animals such as goats, chickens, hens, and others. Her business is located in her home. She has six years of experience in this business and has very good personal and work references in her district. 

She is applying for a loan to buy a larger quantity of animals, such as goats, hens, ducks, and others. She will also make repairs to the place where she raises them (corrals). With this loan, Karina hopes to offer a better product to her clients. This will allow her to generate a higher income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals such as goats, hens, ducks, and others as well as to make repairs to the place where she raises them.

loans.name: Ceferino

texts.es:
Ceferino tiene 38 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 7 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Ceferino espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ceferino, 38, lives with his partner and children in his own house, made of rustic materials, in the district of Pomahuaca. This district is located in the province of Jaén in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is calm and its inhabitants work mainly in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

He works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee. He has seven years of experience in this field and has very good personal and work references in the area. He will use this loan to buy manure and fertilizer to adequately maintain his coffee crops, as well as to pay workers for the harvest season. With this loan, Ceferino hopes to offer a better quality of coffee to his clients, which will have a positive impact on his income level and will also improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his coffee crops, as well as to pay workers for the harvest.

loans.name: Hikmatullo

texts.ru: Хикматулло молодой мужчина в возрасте 36 лет.Хикматулло женат и имеет на иждивении 2 детей. Он живет в сельской местности.Хикматулло занимается строительными работами и работает на частных стройках по найму. По сезону он ездит в Россию на заработки. Жена Хикматулло помогает мужу вести хозяйство и летом выходит на полевые работы. Зимой она занимается вышиванием национальных платьев. Жена как может помогает мужу обеспечивать семью но тех денег что они зарабатывают не достаточно для того, чтобы позволить себе купить что то лишнее. Хикматулло хочет купить автомобиль но из за финансовых проблем он не может себе это позволить. С данной проблемой он решил обратиться в "АРВАНД" за финансовой поддержкой.
texts.en:
Hikmatullo is a young man of 36 years.  He is married and has two dependent children.  They live in a rural area.  Hikmatullo is in the construction business, traveling to Russia in the construction season.  He also works for hire on private construction projects.  Hikmatullo's wife helps him with his business and, in the summer, she does farm work.  During the winter, she sews traditional women's clothing.  She does everything she can to help her husband provide for their family, but the money they earn isn't enough to buy anything extra.

Hikmatullo would like to buy a car, but he can't because of their financial difficulties.  He decided to resolve this problem by applying to MDO Arvand, LLC for financial support.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en:
Marwa is a 30-year-old married woman from Nablus city. She is a mother of three sons and one daughter. Marwa has a barn for raising sheep and cows. She works with her husband and produces diary products. Marwa would like to improve the family business and expand it in the future.

Marwa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy feed for the sheep and cow barn. By taking this loan, Marwa will be able to improve the barn and increase its productivity. 

Marwa appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy feed for the sheep and cow barn.
